name: The Viper Den
description:
Made in one week for the GJL Game Parade Summer 2021 Gamejam.

V1 = Original version

V2 = Polished version

Web version is V2! Download below to play V1 or V2 on Windows.

Collect all the food before you lose all your ants.

Abilities can only be used once.

Returning food the nest grants new abilities and more ants.

Controls:

Escape - Menu / Reset

Hold Space - Show Controls

Mouse Click - Use active ability

A & D - Rotate Camera

X - Replace active ability with new random one (Important for the end game!)

Z (or Tab) - Hold ability for use later
